ygData.subject: Re: Which Exp. Pack to buy.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi ya ;-)I would have to go with Wulfric on this one.SoL.You will REALLY need the Bazaar.You will also get at least some benifet of the Nexus and the spires
ygData.messageBody:
Hi ya ;-)I would have to go with Wulfric on this one.SoL.You will
REALLY need the Bazaar.You will also get at least some benifet of the
Nexus and the spires for travel.But the Bazaar is a must now.I cant
see being without it.
Kahlyne Syndesire/Laurie
EQfaces http://www.eqfaces.com/cgi/files/engine/profile.php?
personalID=4857






--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@e...>
wrote:
> Well I didnt take the Bazaar into account. I was merely thinking
about travel. However, with the Bazaar SoL would be a better
purchase cause then it's easier to buy armor and gear for your level.
>
> Wulfric
>
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: naslund19@a...
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Tuesday, January 21, 2003 9:46 AM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Which Exp. Pack to buy.
>
>
> > From: "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@e...>
> >
> > however if you go with Luclin you may find you
> > need to donate money to wizzies or druids to get
> > you to a location that has a wizzy spire that can
> > take you to Luclin or elsewhere... there is
> > one right in Gfay though. I'd still say go with
> > Planes of Power becasue that takes you to every
> > major city which is where you'd go to buy your spells.
> > The Luclin spires won't do that.
>
> Given your level, I would definitely go for Luclin over PoP or
SoV. While the
> PoP portal system makes travel much easier, at your level, SoL
offers much more
> to your character than either of the other 2. The SoL port
system is slower,
> but you get a number of new zones to hunt in and the Bazaar,
which is very
> useful to lower level chars looking for decently priced gear.
>
> Sulamwen
> Warder of <Fate's Forge>
> E'ci
>
>
